summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department adding the Royal Brougham sewer line replacement project to the 1993 Capital Improvement Program; adopting the project as a system or plan of additions and betterments to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; making an appropriation from the Drainage and Wastewater Fund Construction Account for such project; increasing the expenditure authority of the Drainage and Wastewater Fund; and authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for such project.
